Name: Verify Checkout Process for Sauce Labs Backpack
Description: Navigate to the home page and login to access the inventory. Add the Sauce Labs Backpack to the cart and proceed to checkout. Verify the checkout process at Step One.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 3: Click on link 'item 4 title link' -> Navigate to page 'inventory-item.html'
Step 4: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack'
Step 5: Click on link '1' -> Navigate to page 'cart.html'
Step 6: Click on button 'checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-one.html'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Checkout Process for Sauce Labs Bike Light
Description: Navigate to the home page and login to access the inventory. Add the Sauce Labs Bike Light to the cart and proceed to checkout. Enter the required information and complete the checkout process at Step Two.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 3: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bike-light'
Step 4: Click on link '2' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-one.html'
Step 5: Click on input field 'firstName'
Step 6: Enter input value in input field 'firstName'
Step 7: Click on input field 'lastName'
Step 8: Enter input value in input field 'lastName'
Step 9: Click on input field 'postalCode'
Step 10: Enter input value in input field 'postalCode'
Step 11: Click on input field 'continue' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-two.html'
Step 12: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
